sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-timeline>
            <v-timeline-item
              v-for="(day, index) in itinerary"
              :key="index"
              :color="getTimelineColor(index)"
            >
              <v-timeline-item-icon>
                <v-icon>{{ getTimelineIcon(index) }}</v-icon>
              </v-timeline-item-icon>
  
              <v-timeline-item-content>
                <v-card>
                  <v-card-title class="headline">{{ day.title }}</v-card-title>
                  <v-card-text>
                    <!-- Display activities for the day -->
                    <v-list>
                      <v-list-item v-for="(activity, i) in day.activities" :key="i">
                        <!-- Display activity image -->
                        <v-list-item-avatar>
                          <v-img :src="activity.image" alt="Activity Image"></v-img>
                        </v-list-item-avatar>
                        
                        <v-list-item-content>
                          <v-list-item-title>{{ activity.name }}</v-list-item-title>
                          <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ activity.description }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                        </v-list-item-content>
                      </v-list-item>
                    </v-list>
                  </v-card-text>
                </v-card>
              </v-timeline-item-content>
            </v-timeline-item>
          </v-timeline>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        itinerary: [
          {
            title: 'Day 1',
            activities: [
              {
                name: 'Morning Hike',
                description: 'Enjoy a refreshing morning hike in the scenic mountains.',
                image: require('@/assets/hike.jpeg'),
              },
              {
                name: 'Visit Museum',
                description: 'Explore fascinating exhibits and artifacts at the local museum.',
                image: require('@/assets/museum.jpeg'),
              },
              {
                name: 'Lunch at Local Restaurant',
                description: 'Savor delicious local cuisine at a charming restaurant.',
                image: require('@/assets/lunch.jpeg'),
              },
            ],
          },
          {
            title: 'Day 2',
            activities: [
              {
                name: 'Explore City Landmarks',
                description: 'Discover iconic landmarks that define the cityscape.',
                image: require('@/assets/landmarks.jpeg'),
              },
              {
                name: 'Afternoon Spa',
                description: 'Relax and rejuvenate with an afternoon spa session.',
                image: require('@/assets/spa.jpeg'),
              },
              {
                name: 'Dinner at Waterfront',
                description: 'Enjoy a delightful dinner with a scenic waterfront view.',
                image: require('@/assets/dinner.jpeg'),
              },
            ],
          },
          // Add more days as needed
        ],
      };
    },
    methods: {
      getTimelineColor(index) {
        // Define colors for each day
        const colors = ['primary', 'info', 'success', 'error', 'warning'];
        return colors[index % colors.length];
      },
      getTimelineIcon(index) {
        // Define icons for each day
        const icons = ['mdi-hiking', 'mdi-map-marker', 'mdi-spa', 'mdi-food', 'mdi-coffee'];
        return icons[index % icons.length];
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
